name: browser-tabs
title: Browser Tabs
description: Search and open tabs in Chrome, Safari, Edge, Arc, Brave, Vivaldi, Opera and Orion, etc.
author: koinzhang

commands.name: index
commands.title: Search Browser Tabs
commands.description: Search and open tabs from your browsers.

preferences.title: Tabs
preferences.name: showDomain
preferences.label: Show Domain
preferences.description: When enabled, the domain of the tab will be displayed as a subtitle.

preferences.name: recentOnTop
preferences.label: Recent Tabs on Top
preferences.description: When enabled, the recent tabs will be displayed on top.

preferences.title: Advanced
preferences.name: rememberFilterTag
preferences.label: Remember Filter Tag
preferences.description: When enabled, the last used filter tag will be remembered and used as the default filter tag.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
